snippet.title: Dragon's Prophet: Evolution.Phase.One Trailer
snippet.description:
The end of Evolution.Phase.One awaits you! Join forces with your dragon and overcome any obstacles with the improved PvE Mounted Combat System. Become a true hero of Laedis with the 'Laedis Hero' questline and pit yourself against friends or foes in the all new Dragon Arena & Dragon Evolution System. Collect, Evolve and Battle your way to glory.

Web: http://goo.gl/hYGcsF
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DragonsProphet
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/DP_Europe
